member.name: T:ClariusLabs.NuDoc.CachedEnumerable
member.summary: Internal class used to cache the results of the enumeration of the container elements.

member.name: T:ClariusLabs.NuDoc.AssemblyMembers
member.summary: Composite of all lazy-read members from an assembly passed to .

member.name: T:ClariusLabs.NuDoc.DocumentMembers
member.summary: Composite of all lazy-read members in a documentation file returned from the .

member.name: T:ClariusLabs.NuDoc.Container
member.summary: Base class for elements that can contain other elements.
member.remarks: Implements the composite pattern for the visitable model.

member.name: T:ClariusLabs.NuDoc.Element
member.summary: Base class for all elements in a documentation file, including types, members, and content like summaries, remarks, etc.
member.remarks: This type is the root of the visitor model hierarchy.

member.name: T:ClariusLabs.NuDoc.IVisitable
member.summary: Exposes the visitor pattern on a visitable model that can receive visitors.

member.summary: Accepts the specified visitor.
member.typeparam: The type of the visitor, inferred from the passed-in .
member.param: The visitor instance to accept.
member.returns: The received visitor. Allows for easy collecting of the results from the visitor.

member.summary: Accepts the specified visitor.

member.summary: Returns a that represents this instance.

member.name: T:ClariusLabs.NuDoc.MemberIdMap
member.summary: Provides bidirectional mapping between reflection members and XML documentation ids.
member.remarks: This map can be used in conjunction with the result of a operation to do post-processing on the by grouping by type, loading inheritance trees, etc.

member.name: M:ClariusLabs.NuDoc.MemberIdMap.Add(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Adds all the members in the specified assembly to the map.
member.param: The assembly to map to member ids.

member.name: M:ClariusLabs.NuDoc.MemberIdMap.AddRange(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Type})
member.summary: Adds a set of types to the map.
member.param: The types to map to member ids.

member.name: M:ClariusLabs.NuDoc.MemberIdMap.Add(System.Type)
member.summary: Adds the specified type to the map.
member.param: The type to map to a member id.

member.name: M:ClariusLabs.NuDoc.MemberIdMap.FindMember(System.String)
member.summary: Given a string, tries to find the corresponding reflection member.
member.param: The member id to find.

member.name: M:ClariusLabs.NuDoc.MemberIdMap.FindId(System.Reflection.MemberInfo)
member.summary: Given a reflection , tries to find the corresponding documentation member id.
member.param: The member to find the id for.
member.returns: The documentation member id if found; otherwise.

member.name: P:ClariusLabs.NuDoc.MemberIdMap.Ids
member.summary: Gets the documentation member ids of all members added so far to the map.

member.name: P:ClariusLabs.NuDoc.MemberIdMap.Members
member.summary: Gets all the reflection members added so far to the map.

member.name: T:ClariusLabs.NuDoc.Reader
member.summary: Reads .NET XML API documentation files, optionally augmenting them with reflection information if reading from an assembly.

member.name: M:ClariusLabs.NuDoc.Reader.Read(System.String)
member.summary: Reads the specified documentation file and returns a lazily-constructed set of members that can be visited.
member.param: Path to the documentation file.
member.returns: All documented members found in the given file.
member.exception: Could not find documentation file to load.

member.name: M:ClariusLabs.NuDoc.Reader.Read(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Uses the specified assembly to locate a documentation file alongside the assembly by changing the extension to ".xml". If the file is found, it will be read and all found members will contain extended reflection information in the property.
member.param: The assembly to read the documentation from.
member.returns: All documented members found in the given file, together with the reflection metadata association from the assembly.
member.exception: Could not find documentation file to load.

member.name: M:ClariusLabs.NuDoc.Reader.SetInfo(ClariusLabs.NuDoc.Member,ClariusLabs.NuDoc.MemberIdMap)
member.summary: Sets the extended reflection info if found in the map.

member.name: M:ClariusLabs.NuDoc.Reader.ReplaceTypes(ClariusLabs.NuDoc.Member,ClariusLabs.NuDoc.MemberIdMap)
member.summary: Replaces the generic with concrete types according to the reflection information.

member.name: M:ClariusLabs.NuDoc.Reader.ReplaceExtensionMethods(ClariusLabs.NuDoc.Member,ClariusLabs.NuDoc.MemberIdMap)
member.summary: Replaces the generic method element with a more specific extension method element as needed.
member.param: The member.
The map.

member.name: M:ClariusLabs.NuDoc.Reader.CreateMember(System.String,System.Xml.Linq.XElement,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{ClariusLabs.NuDoc.Element})
member.summary: Creates the appropriate type of member according to the member id prefix.

member.name: M:ClariusLabs.NuDoc.Reader.ReadContent(System.Xml.Linq.XElement)
member.summary: Reads all supported documentation elements.

member.name: M:ClariusLabs.NuDoc.Reader.FindAttribute(System.Xml.Linq.XElement,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves an attribute value if found, otherwise, returns a null string.

member.name: M:ClariusLabs.NuDoc.Reader.TrimText(System.String)
member.summary: Trims the text by removing new lines and trimming the indent.

member.name: M:ClariusLabs.NuDoc.Reader.TrimCode(System.String)
member.summary: Trims the code by removing extra indent.
